attributes.action: Remove all Scotsmen form English Parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only do the Scots have their own parliment to govern (built at a cost of £414M + £14M for an inquiry into costs!) they are also running the show in the House of Commons.  We are all sick & tired of being governed by the tartan raiders let's have an English Parliment.
